amendment.description: To rescind funds from the Department of Energy loan programs office.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3289, under the order of 9/19/24, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 247.

action.text: Amendment SA 3289 proposed by Senator Paul.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3289 proposed by Senator Paul.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3289, under the order of 9/19/24, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 247.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3289, under the order of 9/19/24, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 47. Record Vote Number: 247.
